模块 com.example.BubbleBobble
程序包 com.example.BubbleBobble.Controller

类 BackgroundSettingController

java.lang.Object
com.example.BubbleBobble.Controller.BackgroundSettingController
public class BackgroundSettingController extends Object
The class, BackgroundController, is the controller for BackgroundSettingScreen, and is linked with BackgroundSettingScreen.fxml The Background Setting screen contains the radio box to choose from three themes of background:
  1. "sea"/li>
  2. "mountain"
  3. "jungle"
The corresponding settings will be transferred to the interactable world
